Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Uvula \U"vu*la\, n. [NL., dim of L. uva a grape, the uvula.] (Anat.) The pendent fleshy lobe in the middle of the posterior border of the soft palate. [1913 Webster]
Note: The term is also applied to a somewhat similar lobe on the under side of the cerebellum and to another on the inner surface of the neck of the bladder. [1913 Webster]
uvula n : a small pendant fleshy lobe at the back of the soft palate [also: {uvulae} (pl)]
